description: As taken from the HITRUST CSF, this section cover strategic risk managment items. Specifically, this cluster's tags are associated with the development and enforcement of an organizational Information Protection Policy.
name: INFO-PROTECTION-POLICY

values.description: Policies for information security are approved by management, published and communicated to employees and relevant external parties.
values.value: OSRS CMCF Strategic Framework: 01.a Policies for Information Security
